title: How to learn Cyrillic, and should I start with scripts or cursive - Quora

response.answer_text: My recommendation would be that you learn Russian (or another language that uses the Cyrillic script, but learning Russian usually gives you more advantages). In order to learn Russian, it is indispensable that you learn the Cyrillic script, too. In a Russian class (at least take the first five or six classes where you will be taught how to read and write the Cyrillic letters) you learn simultaneously both the “regular” printed form of Cyrillic letters (block lettets) AND cursive.
